text: Doris "Dorie" Miller (October 12, 1919November 24, 1943) was an American Naval cook. He was the first Black recipient of the Navy Cross. He was also a nominee for the Medal of Honor. He won the Navy Cross because of his heroism in fighting the Japanese bombers at Pearl Harbor. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1919 births Category:1943 deaths Category:African-American military personnel Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:People from Waco, Texas Category:Purple Heart recipients
title: Doris Miller
